-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema aipms
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS aipms DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ;
USE aipms ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.member
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.member (
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  role ENUM('USER', 'ADMIN') NULL DEFAULT 'USER',
  subscription TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  kakao_id VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  login_type ENUM('NORMAL', 'KAKAO') NULL DEFAULT 'NORMAL',
  reg_date DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  car_number VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  agree_to_terms TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  agree_to_privacy TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  agree_to_marketing TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  member_code VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  status ENUM('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE',
  car_model VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (member_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX email (email ASC) VISIBLE,
  UNIQUE INDEX member_code (member_code ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 4
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.account_info
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.account_info (
  id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  point INT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  point_expire_next_month INT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  prepaid_balance INT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  last_charged_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  monthly_usage INT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  compare_last_month DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT '0',
  created_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  UNIQUE INDEX member_id (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_account_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.car
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.car (
  car_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  car_number VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  car_type VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  reg_date DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (car_id),
  INDEX fk_car_member (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_car_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.cctv_status_log
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.cctv_status_log (
  id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  camera_name VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  last_checked_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  last_connected DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  record_status VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  log_type VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 319
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.parking
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.parking (
  parking_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  name VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  space_no VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  is_occupied TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  cctv_url VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (parking_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.parking_log
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.parking_log (
  id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  car_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  member_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  parking_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '일반',
  entry_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
  exit_time DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  camera_id INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  is_paid TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
  paid_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  fee INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  payment_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  INDEX fk_parkinglog_member (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX idx_car_number (car_number ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX fk_payment (payment_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_parkinglog_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id)
    ON DELETE SET NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_payment
    FOREIGN KEY (payment_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.payment (payment_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 11
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.payment
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.payment (
  payment_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  total_fee INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  paid TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  payment_time DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  payment_gateway VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  transaction_id VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  subscription_id VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  merchant_uid VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  imp_uid VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  payment_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '일반',
  car_number VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT '대기',
  member_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  cancelled TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  cancel_reason VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  entry_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (payment_id),
  INDEX fk_entry (entry_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_entry
    FOREIGN KEY (entry_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.parking_log (id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 7
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.entry_log
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.entry_log (
  entry_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  car_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  parking_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  entry_time DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  exit_time DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  status ENUM('IN', 'OUT') NULL DEFAULT 'IN',
  ai_detected TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  payment_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (entry_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX uq_entry_payment (payment_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX fk_entry_car (car_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX fk_entry_parking (parking_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_entry_car
    FOREIGN KEY (car_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.car (car_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_entry_parking
    FOREIGN KEY (parking_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.parking (parking_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_entry_payment
    FOREIGN KEY (payment_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.payment (payment_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.fire_alert_log
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.fire_alert_log (
  id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  label VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  confidence DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  video_url VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  image_path VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  detected_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  admin_judgment VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  alert_status VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  alert_time DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  notes TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  created_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.kakao_token
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.kakao_token (
  token_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  kakao_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  access_token TEXT NOT NULL,
  refresh_token TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  issued_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  expires_at DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (token_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX kakao_id (kakao_id ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 2
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.membership
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.membership (
  id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  membership_grade VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  joined_at DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  total_usage_count INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  total_payment INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  discount_rate INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  benefits JSON NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  UNIQUE INDEX member_id (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_membership_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.reservation
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.reservation (
  reservation_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  vehicle_number VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  reservation_start DATETIME NOT NULL,
  reservation_end DATETIME NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('WAITING', 'APPROVED', 'CANCELLED') NULL DEFAULT 'WAITING',
  PRIMARY KEY (reservation_id),
  INDEX fk_reserve_member (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_reserve_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table aipms.subscription
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aipms.subscription (
  subscription_id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  member_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  end_date DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  active TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT '1',
  customer_uid VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (subscription_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX member_id (member_id ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_sub_member
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES aipms.member (member_id))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 2
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
